column4: Startup-manager keeps changing the names of my grub menu entries! How do I make it stop?
Okay, one more time. Startup Manager keeps changing the names of my grub menu entries. How do I make it stop?
How exactly have they been changing?

I used to have just 4 entries: Ubuntu 8.04.1, Ubuntu 8.04.1 (recovery), memtest86+, and Windows XP. Whenever I startup the Startup Manager, it changes the names of the first three to Debian GNU/Linux, kernel blah blah blah whatever, and adds a separator before the WinXP entry.
